code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import logger from'redux-logger';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import{fetchUsersStart}from'./users/user.sagas';import rootReducer from'./root-reducer';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware,logger];var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));sagaMiddleware.run(fetchUsersStart);export default store;
